contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Stadium | stadium_name = Zaawia Stadium | nickname = | image = | caption = | fullname = | location = [[Zawiya, Libya|Zawiya]], [[Libya]] | built = | coordinates = {{coord|32|45|14|N|12|44|21|E|display=it}}<ref name="goalzz_info">[http://www.goalzz.com/main.aspx?showstadiums=1&searchcountry=LY&stadium=420 Zaawia Stadium] Stadium information at goalzz.com</ref> | opened = | renovated = | owner = [[Olomby]] | operator = [[Olomby]] | surface = [[Grass]] | tenants = [[Olomby]] | seating_capacity = 14,000<ref>[http://www.soccerway.com/venues/libya/al-olympic-stadium-az-zwiyah-stadium/ Al-Olympic Stadium] at Soccerway</ref> (6,000 seated)<ref name="goalzz_info"/> | dimensions = {{convert|68|m|yd|0}} by {{convert|105|m|yd|0}} }} '''Zaawia Stadium''' is a [[multi-purpose stadium]] in [[Zawiya, Libya|Zawiya]], [[Libya]]. The stadium holds 14,000 people. It is currently used mostly for [[football (soccer)|football]] matches and is the home ground of [[Al Olympic Zaouia]].<ref name="goalzz_info"/> == References == {{reflist}} {{Libyan Premier League Venues}} [[Category:Football venues in Libya]] [[Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Libya]] [[Category:Tripolitania]] [[Category:Zawiya, Libya]] {{Libya-sports-venue-stub}} [[ar:الملعب الأولمبي]]
